THE APP_NAME MISMATCH WARNING
----------------------------------------------------------------------

Warning still appears:
"App name mismatch detected. The runner is configured with app name
'research_intelligence_platform', but the root agent was loaded from
'.../.venv/.../google/adk/agents', which implies app name 'agents'."

This is SAFE TO IGNORE because:
- Known ADK issue (github.com/google/adk-python/issues/3133)
- Functionality is unaffected
- Only occurs with programmatically created agents
- Will be fixed in future ADK version

NEXT STEPS
----------------------------------------------------------------------

When creating new agents:
1. Import: from src.utils.config import APP_NAME, DEFAULT_USER_ID
2. Use APP_NAME in session_service.create_session()
3. Use APP_NAME in Runner initialization
4. Generate unique session_id per invocation

Example:
  session_id = f"my_agent_{uuid.uuid4().hex[:8]}"
  session = await session_service.create_session(
      app_name=APP_NAME,
      user_id=DEFAULT_USER_ID,
      session_id=session_id
  )
